00011 template<typename T>
00012 string vector_to_string(vector<T> v)
00013 {
00014   stringstream buffer;
00015   buffer << "[";
00016 
00017   if (!v.empty())
00018   {  buffer << v[0]; }
00019   else
00020   { buffer << "]"; }
00021 
00022   if (v.size() == 1)
00023   { buffer << "]"; }
00024   else
00025   {
00026     for (size_t i = 1, S = v.size(); i < S; ++i) buffer << ", " << v[i];
00027     buffer << "]";
00028   }
00029 
00030   return buffer.str();
00031 }

00033 namespace Sass {
00034 
00035   using namespace std;
00036 
00037   template<typename T>
00038   vector<vector<T> > paths(vector<vector<T> > strata, size_t from_end = 0)
00039   {
00040     if (strata.empty()) {
00041       return vector<vector<T> >();
00042     }
00043 
00044     size_t end = strata.size() - from_end;
00045     if (end <= 1) {
00046       vector<vector<T> > starting_points;
00047       starting_points.reserve(strata[0].size());
00048       for (size_t i = 0, S = strata[0].size(); i < S; ++i) {
00049         vector<T> starting_point;
00050         starting_point.push_back(strata[0][i]);
00051         starting_points.push_back(starting_point);
00052       }
00053       return starting_points;
00054     }
00055 
00056     vector<vector<T> > up_to_here = paths(strata, from_end + 1);
00057     vector<T>          here       = strata[end-1];
00058 
00059     vector<vector<T> > branches;
00060     branches.reserve(up_to_here.size() * here.size());
00061     for (size_t i = 0, S1 = up_to_here.size(); i < S1; ++i) {
00062       for (size_t j = 0, S2 = here.size(); j < S2; ++j) {
00063         vector<T> branch = up_to_here[i];
00064         branch.push_back(here[j]);
00065         branches.push_back(branch);
00066       }
00067     }
00068 
00069     return branches;
00070   }
00071 
00072 }
00073 
00074 #endif
